name: River Rafting
description:
A Brave man with a Green Poncho decides to go Rafting in the middle of a storm. 

Will he Survive? Thats on You!

Avoid the boulders and survive as long as you can!

This game was a learning expierience for me since this is my 1st finished project!

The full game + art was made in 2 Hours. 

Hope you enjoy survive! - manoman_yt
